titleStmt.title: Three general epistles to be read in all the congregations of the righteous, who are gathered out of the house of Adam in the fall, into the house of Christ that never fell, to be read amongst them. / By, G.F.
titleStmt.author: Fox, George, 1624-1691.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
